overview: A coming of age short film about a twenty-something year old woman overcoming indecision and her own lethargic disposition. Recently fired from her job, Milly reluctantly obeys her mother’s ultimatum in exchange for rent payment and goes to see a Life Coach. Milly’s selfishness and inconsiderate behavior hinder her in life, but a young boy from the LGBT community named Robert is about to enter her self-centered world and change it forever.
title: Unbound
